sub_title: Senior Lecturer & Researcher Continuous Improvement & Data Analytic Capability
summary:
I research how organizations can improve their performance using continuous improvement methods. 
Two topics I find fascinating are 
1) how to help Social Enterprises increase their impact and 
2) how to help organizations improve their Data Analytic Capability

My specialties and areas of teaching & research are: Service operations management & quality, revenue management, financial management, simulation, operations research, quantitative research methods, lean six sigma, continuous improvement.

authors.headline: Senior Lecturer & Researcher Continuous Improvement & Data Analytic Capability

profile_positions.description: I currently teach Research Methods and Business Intelligence. I am particularly interested in Data Driven Decision Making, and the link to lean / sustainable / transparent supply chains.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer - Master in Supply Chain Management
Visiting Lecturer Research Methods - Master Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description: I conduct research in how organizations can improve their performance using continuous improvement methods. Two topics I find fascinating are 1) how to help Social Enterprises increase their impact and 2) how to help organizations improve their Data Analytic Capability.
profile_positions.title: Senior Researcher Continuous Improvement & Digitalization

profile_positions.description: Thanks to a grant from SiA, I am researching how multinational companies can roll out continuous improvement initiatives (e.g. Lean Six Sigma) in a way that takes cultural differences into account.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher - Lectorate Improving Business

profile_positions.description: I have developed and taught a variety of courses and projects, covering topics such as research methods, intercultural management, operations management, and international business.  I strongly believe in developing courses with the input and cooperation of businesses, as they know best what skills and knowledge our graduates require. Feel free to reach out!
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer - International Business

Graduate Research Assistant - School of Hospitality Management

profile_positions.description:
Two year apprenticeship in revenue management. I assisted the revenue manager by forecasting demand for the two Paris properties (Le Meridien Etoile 1025 rooms and Le Meridien Montparnasse - 953 rooms) and managing capacity across distribution channels; preparing weekly and monthly revenue meetings; preparing budgets; preparing weekly operational forecasts; evaluating performance. 
The last three months I had taken on the responsibilities of e-commerce manager (managing third party websites including contracts, room allotment and pricing, content, supervising billing, GDS advertising)...
profile_positions.title: Revenue Management Apprentice - Assistant to Revenue Manager
